properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:59PM PST until January 13 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...NEXT STORM SYSTEM MOVING IN SUNDAY...

.Our next weather system will move in early Sunday bringing heavy
snow to the mountains and valleys above 2000 ft. Breezy
conditions, especially on exposed ridges, will create areas of
blowing snow which could significantly reduce visibility. Plan on
slippery road conditions which will make travel difficult.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...Coeur d'Alene, Post Falls, Hayden, Worley, Moscow,
Plummer, Potlatch, and Genesee.

* WHEN...From 7 AM Sunday to 4 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions which will make
travel very difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY
